known_issues: User admin approval flow is broken: approving/rejecting users fails with error 'Invalid principal argument: "<principal>"' (cannot approve users).

existing_features.title: Fix the Admin Users approval/rejection flow so it passes a real Principal to the backend `setApproval` call (not a string cast to `any`), preventing the runtime error `Invalid principal argument: "<principal>"` when approving or rejecting users.

Add frontend validation and user-facing error handling for approval actions: if a Principal cannot be parsed/constructed, block the mutation and show a clear error message in the Admin Users UI (English).

projectName: Fix admin user approval/rejection failing with 'Invalid principal argument'
